resources.string: text1: Various kinds of data that will be auto-linked. 1)Click on http://www.google.com to launch the web browser. 2)Click on google.com too. 3)Click on (415) 555-1212 to dial the phone. 4)Click foobar@example.com to launch email app. 5)Click http://www.example.com/lala/foobar@example.com to launch browser, not the e-mail app. 6)Click a location like 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043
text2: Explicit links using <a> markup. This has markup for a link specified via an <a> tag. Use a \"tel:\" URL to dial a phone number.
